import React from"react";import{db}from"../firebase";import{collection,addDoc}from"firebase/firestore";const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{await addDoc(collection(db,"contactMessages"),{name,email,phone,message,submittedAt:Timestamp.now()});alert("Message sent successfully!");// Reset form
setName("");setEmail("");setPhone("");setMessage("");}catch(error){console.error("Error sending message:",error);alert("There was an error. Please try again.");}};export default Contact;
